Processing Speed.RSPCA Pet Insurance: Processing time varies, typically 5-10 business days.

Required Documents.Bronze Pet Insurance: Completed claim form, vet invoices, medical history.
Required Documents.Silver Pet Insurance: Vet invoices, medical records, treatment details.
Required Documents.Gold\/Platinum Pet Insurance: Vet invoices, medical history, treatment notes.
Required Documents.Medibank Pet Insurance: Vet invoices, medical records, treatment details.
Required Documents.RSPCA Pet Insurance: Completed claim form, vet invoices, medical history.

Reimbursement Method.Silver Pet Insurance: Direct deposit or credit to next premium payment.
